select a.app_id app_id, a.app_name app_name, a.app_code app_code, a.type type, a.regist_hhmmss regist_hhmmss, a.up_hhmmss up_hhmmss, a.owner owner, a.app_status app_status, a.business_id business_id, b.business_name business_name from ms_show_app a left join ms_business b on a.business_id = b.business_id
where a.app_name like #keyword#
order by a.regist_hhmmss desc
Limit #min#, #max#
select app_id from ms_show_app where app_name=#appName#

SELECT CATEGORY_MERCHANT_BUSINESS.category_id AS category_id, CATEGORY_MERCHANT_BUSINESS.category_name AS category_name, CATEGORY_MERCHANT_BUSINESS.business_id AS business_id, CATEGORY_MERCHANT_BUSINESS.business_name AS business_name, ms_show_app.app_id AS app_id, ms_show_app.app_code AS app_code, ms_show_app.app_name AS app_name, ms_show_app.type AS type, ms_show_app.share_info_des AS share_info_des, ms_show_app.share_info_pic AS share_info_pic, ms_show_app.owner AS owner, ms_show_app.regist_hhmmss AS regist_hhmmss, ms_show_app.publish_time AS publish_time, ms_show_app.app_status AS app_status FROM ( SELECT ms_business.business_id, ms_business.business_name, CATEGORY_MERCHANT.category_id, CATEGORY_MERCHANT.category_name FROM ( SELECT ms_merchant_manage.merchant_id, ms_category.category_id, ms_category.nm_zh as category_name FROM ms_category INNER JOIN ms_merchant_manage WHERE ms_category.category_id = ms_merchant_manage.category_id
AND ms_category.category_id IN
#categoryIds[]#
) CATEGORY_MERCHANT INNER JOIN ms_business WHERE CATEGORY_MERCHANT.merchant_id = ms_business.merchant_id ) CATEGORY_MERCHANT_BUSINESS INNER JOIN ms_show_app WHERE CATEGORY_MERCHANT_BUSINESS.business_id = ms_show_app.business_id
AND ms_show_app.app_status=#status#
AND ms_show_app.type IN
#types[]#
ORDER BY category_id, ms_show_app.regist_hhmmss desc
Limit #min#, #max#

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT ms_business.business_id FROM ( SELECT ms_merchant_manage.merchant_id FROM ms_category INNER JOIN ms_merchant_manage WHERE ms_category.category_id = ms_merchant_manage.category_id
AND ms_category.category_id IN
#categoryIds[]#
) CATEGORY_MERCHANT INNER JOIN ms_business WHERE CATEGORY_MERCHANT.merchant_id = ms_business.merchant_id ) CATEGORY_MERCHANT_BUSINESS INNER JOIN ms_show_app WHERE CATEGORY_MERCHANT_BUSINESS.business_id = ms_show_app.business_id
AND ms_show_app.app_status=#status#
AND ms_show_app.type IN
#types[]#
